I don't remember much about 2012 from my visions but I do believe the w=
orld will 
continue. It is just the hurricanes, earthquakes, tidal waves, a=

web cams and=C2=A0the Internet will show us mu=

about that bad stuff.=C2=A0Which is=

u, but...
Apathy, Boredom, Re- evaluation, Hope, Day Dreaming, Self- Absorb=
ed, 
Disillusioned, is what tarot shows me about you=C2=A0 from the boxes a=
nd the news.
Any question for me as a psychic, love/money/career questions =
I'll answer. Just 
send them to my e-mail.
Sonny

=C2=A0
